item.title: Postgres: Reset primary key sequence
item.description: Hello there! I’ve met a problem with using SQLAlchemy framework. Look below: db.session.add(AnObject) try: db.session.commit() except: db.session.rollback() An error in commit() cause the call to get a new sequence of the table primary key. It updates the sequence number like: SELECT nextval('table_id_seq'); I’d expected that rollback() must roll it back, but it didn’t. I tried to find solution at michaelcho.me but it was unsuccessful. Solving First what may be found is the next command:
